attributes.action: amend the vat system to account for the carbon footprint of goods and services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current VAT collection system can be altered and a carbon added tax created which takes account of the use of fossil fuels used in the manufacture and supply of those goods.This new system would have three bands of rate, the overall collection of tax would be the same as current levels.
Low level of only 5% would be for energy saving or efficient goods and services such as insulation materials,energy saving light bulbs etc.
Top rate would be 25% and include large 4x4s or long haul short stay holidays etc.
Standard rate would be 17.5% and include all other goods and services.
We must stop talking and making pronouncements and start to put real pressure on the inefficient industries where ever they maybe to start to change before it is too late and our generation is despised in history as the indolent procrastinators who failed our grandchildren!
This new system is a realistic lever with which we can increase pressure until the problem is solved.
Mr Brown we cannot bury our heads any longer,Please Please can we see some action.
